examples.text: Sales are up by roughly 10 per cent.
We live roughly halfway between here and the coast.
They all left at roughly the same time.
**Roughly speaking**, we receive about fifty letters a week on the subject.

definitions.definition: using force or not being careful and gentle

examples.text: He pushed her roughly out of the way.
‘What do you want?’ she demanded roughly.

definitions.definition: in a way that does not leave a smooth surface
